summary: The implementation covers most of the BuildRequest requirements. The frontend includes home page with hero section, photo gallery, news section, admission form with photo upload, and admin panel with Internet Identity authentication. The backend stores admission submissions, manages gallery photos, and handles news posts. However, there is missing email field in the admission form implementation and some design/color scheme details are not fully verifiable from the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create an admission form page with fields for: full name, complete address, email, date of birth, and mobile number
missing_requirements.reason: The admission form backend schema includes fields for fullName, dateOfBirth, mobile, lastQualification, and address, but does not include an 'email' field as specified in the requirement

hallucinated_features.reason: The backend schema includes a 'lastQualification' field which was not requested in any requirement. REQ-4 only specifies full name, complete address, email, date of birth, and mobile number

hallucinated_features.description: User profile management with name field
hallucinated_features.reason: The backend implements getCallerUserProfile, getUserProfile, and saveCallerUserProfile functions with a UserProfile type containing a name field. Profile setup modal is also present in the frontend. This functionality was not requested in any requirement
